channel.title: redis on 哈姆巴特

item.title: cron触发sendmail&postdrop之后引发系统资源枯竭
item.description: 事情的起因 同事告诉我我们线上一组游戏服进不去了，我查了一下错误日志，看到 Redis 服务报了以下错误 MISCONF Redis is configured to save RDB snapshots, but is currently not able to persist on disk. Commands that may modify the data set are
